title: "Revive" passives
body:
Okay, this isn't a complaint, or a rant, or anything like either of them. This is a question. 

So I main Cho'Gath who has the ability to deal a shit ton of True Damage and get a bonus if he kills them with said True Damage ability, but I always seem to mess up when it comes to people with passives that can revive them, like {{champion:266}} , {{champion:34}} , and {{champion:154}} . 

Now I'm just wondering, that like with Aatrox he gets the GA effect around him, is there any way to tell if Anivia's or Zac's passive is currently up, apart from relying on your team to tell you when a passive is blown and then for you to mentally make note of when it happened. 

Again, this isn't a complaint or a rant, this is just me wondering if there is anything in game that gives me this information.

replies.body: There's no visual effect like Aatrox's for Zac or Anivia; however, you can click on them in-game and look at the small character sheet that appears at the top left of the screen to see if they have their revive passives up. Anivia's will be a blue egg icon (and the icon will turn grey when it's on cooldown); Zac's will be a green blob icon. I like to check whether they have the buff or not before I commit to fighting any one of them.
Is it glitchy? because a few games ago i went against an anivia and when i look at her she had no icon but still had her egg
Sounds like a bug; it should show the Rebirth icon by default if Anivia has it available.
dont believe there is. it's just something you have to actually see and keep a timer on
